title: DIY Ultra-Powerful Natural Germicide JADAM Sulfur(JS) 10L for Gardeners. Homemade pesticide

tasks.task: Making JADAM sulfur involves several tasks.
subtasks: Measuring and preparing 5 liters of water.
Adding 2.5 kilograms of sulfur to the water.
Adding 2 kilograms of sodium hydroxide to the mixture.
Adding 250 grams of sea salt to the mixture.
Using a wooden stick or spatula to stir the mixture carefully.
Adding 3.2 liters of water to complete the process.
Using a heat-resistant bottle to store the final product.
Measure and prepare 5 liters of water
Add 2.5 kg of sulfur to the water
Add 2 kg of sodium hydroxide to the mixture
Stir the mixture with a wooden stick or spatula
Add 3.2 liters of water to complete the process
Use a heat-resistant bottle to store the solution
